query: SELECT a.id, a.name, a.dateTaken, a.maxScore, COUNT(g.id) as grade_count, AVG(g.score) as avg_score FROM assessments a LEFT JOIN grades g ON g.assessmentId = a.id GROUP BY a.id, a.name, a.dateTaken, a.maxScore ORDER BY a.id;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2TWBtpcjgwG5hzA.51374b31de3a --database hFUnU9s979wktvWmUbU36Q --execute SELECT a.id, a.name, a.dateTaken, a.maxScore, COUNT(g.id) as grade_count, AVG(g.score) as avg_score FROM assessments a LEFT JOIN grades g ON g.assessmentId = a.id GROUP BY a.id, a.name, a.dateTaken, a.maxScore ORDER BY a.id;
